title: Numbers on Belgian temporary car plate
content:
Hi, does anyone know which font is this?  
Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMGP5715.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014145539/http:/typophile.com/files/IMGP5715.jpg) | 51.7 KB |

 [‹ (x) Peugeot 205 t16 font - Traffic {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014145539/http:/typophile.com/node/33357 "Go to previous forum topic") [Stumped! A logo created in France a few decades or more ago. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014145539/http:/typophile.com/node/33358 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Max_it

comments.content:
This isn’t a Belgian car plate. It looks like this: [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Belgian\_car\_number\_plates](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014145539/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Belgian_car_number_plates "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Belgian\_car\_number\_plates")

The numbers however look similar. And I’m afraid I can’t help you with this one.

<cite>This isn’t a Belgian car plate.</cite>

But the car doesn’t know that...

Try Lineto’s offering under Headline fonts.

[http://www.lineto.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014145539/http:/www.lineto.com/ "http://www.lineto.com/")

I don’t think you’ll find this in a font. Similar: [Engschrift Austria](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014145539/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/engschrift_austria_ot_std/&sample_text=646030&sample_size=144), [FF DIN Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014145539/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_din_condensed_black/&sample_text=646030&sample_size=144), [Engschrift DIN 1421](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014145539/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/engschrift_din_1421_ot_std/&sample_text=646030&sample_size=144)

mmmmh..  
this is my car plate and I can assure you that I’ve bought my car in Belgium.  
In effect it’s a temporary plate...  
thanks.

More: [Wilma](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014145539/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/type_o_tones/wilma_base/&sample_text=646030&sample_size=96)  
 [DIN 1451 Engschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014145539/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/din_1451_std_engschrift_ot/&sample_text=646030&sample_size=144)

I think the Austria Engschrift or a heavied [Numberplate Belgium](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014145539/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Headline+Fonts/Numberplate/Belgium/) are your closest matches.
